channel.title: Custom minigame help
channel.description:
hi i was planning on making a game and i need it so players can make walls or maybe drop something that is in there inventory please help i will give you credit thank you
ps when the "wall" is placed or builtit needs to be solid so noone can walk through it but maybe can destroy it

item.title: Custom minigame help
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I’m not too sure how to do this but I believe the structure would be something like this.

Make a teleport to the designated area which also tells the user the cmds they’ll need later.
Make cmds that the player can use while in this designated area which spawns objects and add a 1 square wall into your cache under where objects are saved etc. Don’t forget to put n,w,e,s co-ords in i.e. the cmd could be ::spawn wall north which would spawn the wall north side on the position the player is standing.
Also, don’t forget to make it disappear when the player logs/tele’s away.
Its very low tech I know but it would work, sorry i can’t tell you how to do it code wise but thats a structure that you can use.

Read full topic
